title: Unable to start geth Fatal  Could not open database
body:
I encountered a problem with the server during the synchronization process, and then used docker-compose to rebuild geth and encountered this problem.

```
INFO [10-02|07:31:54.115] Starting Geth on Ethereum mainnet... 
INFO [10-02|07:31:54.115] Bumping default cache on mainnet         provided=1024 updated=4096
INFO [10-02|07:31:54.117] Maximum peer count                       ETH=50 LES=0 total=50
INFO [10-02|07:31:54.118] Smartcard socket not found, disabling    err="stat /run/pcscd/pcscd.comm: no such file or directory"
INFO [10-02|07:31:54.469] Using pebble as the backing database 
INFO [10-02|07:31:54.469] Allocated cache and file handles         database=/root/.ethereum/geth/chaindata cache=2.00GiB handles=524,288
Chain metadata
  databaseVersion: 8 (0x8)
  headBlockHash: 0xd23a9331459df1f74c280aa4601bf9c228ecf2798ac547096d7431d64ab8c941
  headFastBlockHash: 0xd23a9331459df1f74c280aa4601bf9c228ecf2798ac547096d7431d64ab8c941
  headHeaderHash: 0xd23a9331459df1f74c280aa4601bf9c228ecf2798ac547096d7431d64ab8c941
  lastPivotNumber: 18260931 (0x116a3c3)
  len(snapshotSyncStatus): 284 bytes
  snapshotDisabled: false
  snapshotJournal: 355215 bytes
  snapshotRecoveryNumber: <nil>
  snapshotRoot: 0x591b6752a7cec03698e18c9a41a6e29dbbecfa1733bce073f801b81a7e0ab2cd
  txIndexTail: 0 (0x0)
  fastTxLookupLimit: <nil>
  SkeletonSyncStatus: {"Subchains":[{"Head":18261105,"Tail":18260970,"Next":"0x6b8512beb652277cdbfe105b005ddce020eada03c6f5d9df4b3cc385be7c0bc9"}],"Finalized":18260986}


Fatal: Could not open database: freezer tables headers and hashes have differing head: 17665438 != 17654466
Fatal: Could not open database: freezer tables headers and hashes have differing head: 17665438 != 17654466
```
